LOGIN.EMAIL_ADDRESS_MIN_LENGTH: Email address must be at least 6 characters.
LOGIN.PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters.
LOGIN.EMAIL_ADDRESS_MAX_LENGTH: Email address must be at most 100 characters.
LOGIN.PASSWORD_MAX_LENGTH: Password must be at most 100 characters.
LOGIN.EMAIL_ADDRESS_PATTERN: Email address must be a valid email address.
LOGIN.PASSWORD_PATTERN: Password must be a valid password.
